description: Phase 5 - CLI Commands: Implement all asp CLI commands as thin wrappers around the engine

userStories.title: Implement CLI Entry Point
userStories.description: As a user, I need the asp command to parse arguments and show help.
acceptanceCriteria: asp with no args shows help
asp --help shows all commands with descriptions
asp <unknown> shows 'unknown command' error with suggestions
Exit codes: 0 for success, 1 for error

userStories.title: Implement asp run Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp run to launch Claude with my configured plugins.
acceptanceCriteria: asp run <target> runs a named target from asp-targets.toml
asp run space:my-space@stable runs a single space in global mode
asp run ./path/to/space runs from local filesystem (dev mode)
Resolves dependencies, materializes plugins, invokes Claude
Forwards remaining args to Claude (asp run dev -- --model sonnet)

userStories.title: Implement asp build Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp build to materialize plugins without launching Claude.
acceptanceCriteria: asp build <target> --output <dir> materializes to output directory
asp build space:my-space@stable --output ./plugins works in global mode
Creates one subdirectory per space in output

userStories.title: Implement asp explain Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp explain to show how my target resolves.
acceptanceCriteria: asp explain <target> shows human-readable resolution info
Works in project mode, global mode, and dev mode

userStories.title: Implement asp install Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp install to resolve and lock my project's dependencies.

userStories.title: Implement asp add Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp add to add a space to a target.
acceptanceCriteria: asp add <spaceRef> --target <name> adds space to target's compose list
--target defaults to first target if only one exists
Shows confirmation of what was added

userStories.title: Implement asp remove Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp remove to remove a space from a target.
acceptanceCriteria: asp remove <spaceId> --target <name> removes space from target's compose list
Errors if space not in target
Shows confirmation of what was removed

userStories.title: Implement asp upgrade Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp upgrade to update locked versions.
acceptanceCriteria: asp upgrade updates all spaces to latest matching versions
asp upgrade <spaceId> updates specific space only
Respects semver ranges in compose refs
Shows what was upgraded (old -> new version)

userStories.title: Implement asp diff Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp diff to preview lock changes before installing.
acceptanceCriteria: asp diff shows what would change if install ran now

userStories.title: Implement asp lint Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp lint to validate my project and spaces.
acceptanceCriteria: asp lint validates project (targets + lock coherence)
Emits warnings with codes (W201, W203, etc.)
Exit code 0 if no errors (warnings OK)

userStories.title: Implement asp list Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp list to see my targets and resolved spaces.
acceptanceCriteria: asp list shows all targets with their compose lists
Shows resolved versions from lock file
Works without lock file (shows unresolved refs)

userStories.title: Implement asp doctor Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp doctor to diagnose my setup.
acceptanceCriteria: Checks Claude binary exists and shows version
Checks ASP_HOME directory exists and is writable
Checks registry remote is reachable (if configured)
Exit code 0 if all checks pass

userStories.title: Implement asp gc Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp gc to clean up unused cache entries.
acceptanceCriteria: asp gc removes unreferenced store entries
Collects references from all project lock files found
Collects references from global lock file
Shows summary: removed entries, freed space
--dry-run shows what would be removed without removing

userStories.title: Implement asp repo init Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp repo init to set up my registry.
acceptanceCriteria: asp repo init creates new registry at $ASP_HOME/repo
asp repo init --clone <url> clones existing registry
Runs asp run agent-spaces-manager at the end (optional, can skip with --no-run)
Errors if repo already exists (use --force to overwrite)

userStories.title: Implement asp repo publish Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp repo publish to version and tag my spaces.
acceptanceCriteria: asp repo publish <spaceId> --tag vX.Y.Z creates version tag
--dist-tag stable also updates stable in dist-tags.json
Validates space passes lint before publishing
Shows confirmation with tag and commit

userStories.title: Implement asp repo status Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp repo status to see my registry state.

userStories.title: Implement asp repo tags Command
userStories.description: As a user, I need asp repo tags to see versions of a space.
acceptanceCriteria: asp repo tags <spaceId> lists all version tags
Shows semver tags and their commits
Shows dist-tags and what versions they point to
